Posts.Content: armysmurf wrote: I recently discovered a small pea sized lump in my upper armpit.  Then about a week later discovered another lump only because it was very sore and tender in that area.  Now I have noticed that the outside of my left breast is swollen.  No redness.  I cannot detect any dimples.  I have fibrocystic breasts from forced menopause so I am very paranoid about everything.  I have a hard time doing self exams because of the fibrocystic breasts and think everything is a lump.  I have an appointment on Tuesday but woud like some info now. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Have lumps HELP armysmurf artsci1
